column1: #Text=Captain says : " We have n't been able to pick up the Avatar 's trail since the storm , but if we continue heading northeast ... " Zuko says : " What do they want ? "
#Text=Iroh says : " Perhaps , a sporting game of Pai Sho ! "
#Text=Soldier says : " The hunt for the Avatar has been given prime importance .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I 've got nothing to report to Admiral Zhao .
#Text=Now get off my ship and let us pass .
#Text=" Soldier says : " Admiral Zhao is not allowing ships in or out of this area .
#Text=I 'm certain you will win if we play again .
